description:
TodayTix. Last minute tickets at insider prices for Broadway and Off-Broadway shows.

Created by Broadway producers, TodayTix provides you with 24-hour mobile access to the best deals in theater today and this week. Enjoy VIP treatment with our easy check-out and exclusive concierge service to hand-deliver your tickets.

* See what’s playing - Browse discounts available for Broadway and Off-Broadway musicals and plays, including pictures, summaries, seating charts, interactive maps and more.
* Select the section and price point that is right for you. Tickets from as low as $30.
* Book in less than 30 seconds, up to 7 days in advance.
* Red Carpet treatment - for our Concierge shows we’ll hand-deliver your tickets right outside the theater. 

Your friends will be in awe of how “in the know” you are. Spread the word and you both save with our referral program - your friend gets $20 off their first purchase, and you get $20 credit towards your next show!

Enter daily lotteries for free or deeply discounted tickets to popular Broadway and Off-Broadway shows! Winners are notified within the app, via push message and email.

——THE BUZZ——

“Standing-ovation-worthy service, which sells tickets up to one week in advance.” - Entertainment Weekly: The Must List

“TodayTix is for travelers who don't feel like killing prime New York City touring time by waiting in line at TKTS, or for those who prefer to plan a few days ahead of time rather than risking their plans to the vagaries of same-day availability." - Frommer's

“TodayTix has unlocked a new generation of theatergoers.” - Huffington Post

"TKTS, but without the long lines... and unlike TKTS, it offers tickets to a week's worth of upcoming performances at any given time." - AMNY 

——FEATURES——

- Filter by show type, venue location, or budget level
- Sign up for alerts to find out when your favorite sold out show becomes available 
- Share your purchases and invite friends via Facebook and Twitter  
- Refer a friend and save! Get future tickets even cheaper when your friends use TodayTix
- Rate shows and see others' ratings 
- Secure and simple credit card processing—just snap a picture of your credit card
- Exclusive last-minute upgrade offers notify you if better seats become available 

LOW PRICES, BIG SAVINGS.  We work to secure the lowest possible prices on tickets.  
SKIP THE LINES.  Secure tickets right on your iPhone or iPad in just 30 seconds. 
LAST-MINUTE TICKETS.  See theater as soon as tonight. Why wait? 
REAL TICKETS GUARANTEED.  We only supply tickets we know to be authentic.
GREAT SEATS.  We work with our channels to secure you the best available seats in the chosen section.
trackCensoredName: TodayTix – New York Theater Tickets App (Broadway & Off-Broadway Shows)
trackName: TodayTix – New York Theater Tickets App (Broadway & Off-Broadway Shows)
releaseNotes:
In 1.4 now you can:
- Set alerts for when show lotteries start accepting entries.
- Change your name/e-mail/phone from Account Settings.
- View videos and photos in full-screen (video trailers! hi-res photos!)
- Filter by family-friendly shows (for all you friendly families)
- Check out our all-new sidebar

Per your requests:
- Quickly locate shows with Search by Title
- Improved assistance if TodayTix is having trouble connecting to our servers
